DOC.brief_summary: To investigate how a switch from fixed combination treatment (ICS and LABA) to other treatments influence asthma or COPD treatment failure
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Study Following Reimbursement Changes in the Use of Fixed Combination Inhalers in Patients With Asthma or Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: All patients who was on treatment with fixed combination asthma or COPD therapy by January 1 2010
DOC.keyword: outcomes associated with the change in reimbursement
